Reproduction Steps:

1) Get the "Aggressive Negotiations" perk from the Administration building. I have a 15% funds off policy. 

2) Click launchpad, click launch, when you are at the rocket click the top green 'Recover Vehicle' button.

3) You will recover the entire cost of the rocket plus extra cash

4) Repeat for infinite money
